structure.unit: B ADMISSION OF AN INDIVIDUAL WITH AN INTELLECTUAL DISABILITY

law.history: Amended 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 146, sec. 36, effective July 12, 2012. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 216, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 2, effective March 28, 2002. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 180, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 369, sec. 20, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 147, sec. 1, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 139, sec. 20, effective July 15, 1988. -- Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 79, sec. 1, effective March 6, 1986. --Created 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 328, sec. 2.
